51-year-old female.context: The patient is a 51-year-old female with a history of chronic nasal obstruction.

chronic nasal obstruction.context: Chronic nasal obstruction secondary to deviated nasal septum and inferior turbinate hypertrophy.

deviated nasal septum.context: Chronic nasal obstruction secondary to deviated nasal septum and inferior turbinate hypertrophy.

inferior turbinate hypertrophy.context: Chronic nasal obstruction secondary to deviated nasal septum and inferior turbinate hypertrophy.

bilateral submucous resection of the inf.context: Procedure Performed: 2. Bilateral submucous resection of the inferior turbinates.

bilateral outfracture of the inferior tu.context: Procedure Performed: 3. Bilateral outfracture of the inferior turbinates.

nasal pledgets.context: Nasal pledgets saturated with 4 cc of 10% cocaine solution were inserted into the nasal cavities.

cocaine solution.context: Nasal pledgets saturated with 4 cc of 10% cocaine solution were inserted into the nasal cavities.

lidocaine solution.context: The nasal septum as well as the turbinates were localized with the mixture of 1% lidocaine with 1:100000 epinephrine solution.

epinephrine solution.context: The nasal septum as well as the turbinates were localized with the mixture of 1% lidocaine with 1:100000 epinephrine solution.

Marcaine solution.context: The turbinates as well as an infraorbital nerve block was performed with 0.25% Marcaine solution.

pHisoHex solution.context: The nasal vestibules were then cleansed with a pHisoHex solution.

scalpel.context: A #15 blade scalpel was then used to make an incision along the length of the caudal septum.

Cottle elevator.context: Once the plane was identified, the mucosal flap on the left side of the septum was elevated with the aid of a Cottle.

septal knife.context: The septal knife was used to make a crossover incision through the cartilage just anterior to the septal spur.

Takahashi forceps.context: Now Knight scissors were used to remove the ascending portion of the nasal cartilage, which was then removed with a Takahashi forceps.

Knight scissors.context: Now Knight scissors were used to remove the ascending portion of the nasal cartilage, which was then removed with a Takahashi forceps.

XPS microdebrider.context: The XPS microdebrider with the inferior turbinate blade was then inserted through the incision and a submucous resection was performed by passing the microdebrider along the length of the bone.

inferior turbinate blade.context: The XPS microdebrider with the inferior turbinate blade was then inserted through the incision and a submucous resection was performed by passing the microdebrider along the length of the bone.

chondral bone.context: The XPS microdebrider with the inferior turbinate blade was then inserted through the incision and a submucous resection was performed by passing the microdebrider along the length of the bone.

minimal blood loss.context: Blood Loss: Minimal less than 25 cc.

severe deviated septum.context: On physical examination, she was derived to have a severely deviated septum with an S-shape deformity as well as turbinate hypertrophy present along the inferior turbinates contributing to the obstruction.

S-shape deformity.context: On physical examination, she was derived to have a severely deviated septum with an S-shape deformity as well as turbinate hypertrophy present along the inferior turbinates contributing to the obstruction.

turbinate hypertrophy.context: On physical examination, she was derived to have a severely deviated septum with an S-shape deformity as well as turbinate hypertrophy present along the inferior turbinates contributing to the obstruction.

patent nasal passages.context: Once all ascending cartilage has been removed, inspection of the nasal cavity revealed patent passages with the exception of inferior turbinates that were very hypertrophied and was felt to be contributing to the patient's symptoms.

inferior turbinates.context: Once all ascending cartilage has been removed, inspection of the nasal cavity revealed patent passages with the exception of inferior turbinates that were very hypertrophied and was felt to be contributing to the patient's symptoms.

hypertrophied inferior turbinates.context: Once all ascending cartilage has been removed, inspection of the nasal cavity revealed patent passages with the exception of inferior turbinates that were very hypertrophied and was felt to be contributing to the patient's symptoms.

nonobstructive nasal passages.context: Once all ascending cartilage has been removed, inspection of the nasal cavity revealed patent passages with the exception of inferior turbinates that were very hypertrophied and was felt to be contributing to the patient's symptoms.

nasal septum.context: The caudal incision was reapproximated with #4-0 chromic suture. Finally, a #4-0 fast absorbing plain gut suture was used to approximate the mucosal surface of the septum in a running whipstitch fashion.

mucosal surface.context: The caudal incision was reapproximated with #4-0 chromic suture. Finally, a #4-0 fast absorbing plain gut suture was used to approximate the mucosal surface of the septum in a running whipstitch fashion.

Merocel packing.context: Finally, Merocel packing was placed and the patient was retuned to the Department of Anesthesia for awakening and taken to the recovery room without incident.
